The banana cape is an item that can be obtained from participating in any Birthday event, and was first obtained from the 2021 Birthday event. It has the same stats as coloured capes and team capes.

A player performing the banana cape's emote.

This item can be stored in the toy box of a costume room.

Like the Cabbage cape, it resembles a Cape of Accomplishment and allows the Skill Cape emote to be performed when worn. It cannot be used instead of a legitimate skillcape for the elite Falador diary task.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Similar to how the cabbage cape is resembling the Brassican cloak in Runescape, the banana cape resembles the Marimban cloak obtainable from the same event.
  • It is the first non POH event item that is members only.

[[File:Banana cape detail.png|left|140px]]
The '''banana cape''' is an item that can be obtained from participating in any [[Birthday event]], and was first obtained from the [[2021 Birthday event]]. It has the same stats as coloured [[cape]]s and [[team cape]]s.

[[File:Banana cape emote.gif|thumb|left|150px|A player performing the banana cape's emote.]]

{{Costume storage|toy box}}

Like the [[Cabbage cape]], it resembles a [[Cape of Accomplishment]] and allows the [[Skill Cape (emote)|Skill Cape]] emote to be performed when worn. It cannot be used instead of a legitimate skillcape for the [[Falador Diary#Elite|elite Falador diary task]].

{{Clear|left}}

==Trivia==
*Similar to how the [[cabbage cape]] is resembling the {{RSL|Brassican cloak}} in ''{{RSL|Runescape}}'', the banana cape resembles the {{RSL|Marimban cloak}} obtainable from the same event.
*It is the first non POH event item that is members only.

{{2021 Birthday event}}
